title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide eligibility for reduced non-regular service military retired pay before age 60, and for other purposes.
content: Guard and Reserve Early Retirement Act of 2007 - Revises provisions concerning eligibility for military retired pay for nonregular (reserve) service to: (1) remove the requirement that the person be at least 60 years of age. And (2) provide an additional qualifier in the case of a combination of minimum age and earned duty points . Continues 60 as the minimum eligibility age for such retirees for health care furnished through the Department of Defense (DOD).
